Package com.pdfjet

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pdfjet.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Used to create image objects and draw them on a page. The image type can be one of the following: ImageType.JPG, ImageType.PNG, ImageType.BMP or ImageType.PNG_STREAM Please see Example_03 and Example_24.

    • Constructor Summary

      The main constructor for the Image class.
      Image​(java.util.List<PDFobj> objects, java.io.InputStream inputStream, int imageType)
      Constructor used to attach images to existing PDF.

        public Image​(PDF pdf,
             java.io.InputStream inputStream,
             int imageType)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        The main constructor for the Image class.
        Parameters:
        pdf - the PDF to which we add this image.
        inputStream - the input stream to read the image from.
        imageType - ImageType.JPG, ImageType.PNG and ImageType.BMP.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an input or output exception occurred
